scripts.postinstall: (npm run install:component-library); (npm run install:component-lib); (npm run install:component-core);
scripts.publish-beta: cd component-library/component-lib && ng build && cd ../dist/ircc-ds-angular-component-library && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish-full: cd component-library/component-lib && ng build && cd ../dist/ircc-ds-angular-component-library && npm publish
scripts.deploy-build: cd component-library/component-lib && ng build ircc-ds-angular-component-library && cd .. && ng build
scripts.translations:toJson: cd component-library && node ./src/assets/locales/ngx-translation-extract.js -r -i src/assets/locales/DS-Strings.txt -l en,fr -o src/assets/locales
scripts.translations:toText: cd component-library && node src/assets/locales/ngx-translation-extract.js -l en,fr -i src/assets/locales/ -o src/assets/locales/DS-Strings.txt --clean
